ref: 9301 br̥sīˊ f. ʻ roll of twisted grass, cushion ʼ ŚrS. [Borrow- ing from Ir. (P. Thieme ZDMG 92, 51 and EWA ii 445), though prob., does not explain variation of b<-> with bh -- ]
Pa. bhisi -- f. ʻ cushion, pad ʼ, bhisikā -- f. ʻ small do. ʼ;
Pk. bisī -- , busī -- , vusī -- , bhisī -- , ˚siā -- f. ʻ a sort of seat, ascetic's seat ʼ;
M. bhī˜s f. ʻ shaggy hair or wool ʼ;
Si. bissa, st. bisi -- , bihi -- ʻ bundle of straw at door to wipe feet on, clod thickly overgrown with grass, ascetic's seat ʼ.
